headline.main: Democracy Is Discussed; Russia, It Is Held, Has Her Own Kind, but It Differs From Ours

lead_paragraph: TO THE EDITOR OF THE NEW YORK TIMES: Those who saw the movie "Ben-Hur" will recall the half-witted galley slave aboard the Roman flagship who, seeing the overseer whip a man already fallen ove his oar, exclaims, "They lash, and they lash, and the man is dead."
